review: This has been a lot of fun.  Set up was really easy and only took minutes.  I am not a very technical person, but I was able to set up without any help. The program basically guides you through setup.Before I purchased my Fire TV Stick I had to hook my Kindle to our TV in order to  watch Netflix and Amazon Prime.  That meant that if my daughter wanted to watch a movie I could not use my Kindle.  I also had to navigate pauses and stops... through the Kindle. The Fire Stick comes with a remote, so I can pause without leaving my seat.Now it is so easy for the whole family to use it.  I also love streaming my favorite radio station through our Bose TV sound system.  I highly recommend this.  It is well worth the money if you are in the situation I was in.
author: lettie
